text: @PressSec @THEHermanCain This is an absolute disgrace. He contracted the virus at a rally you insisted on having because you refuse to accept science & the lives lost do not matter to your campaign. Jesus really dislikes you, @PressSec #soldyoursoul #COVID19 #HermanCain
